name: Between a Rock and a Thistlefur
tooltip:
Between a Rock and a Thistlefur

Take down 12 Thistlefur Avengers and 12 Thistlefur Shaman; most are located east of Zoram Strand in Thistlefur Village.  Once completed, return to Karang Amakkar at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

Requirements:
- Thistlefur Avenger x 12
- Thistlefur Shaman x 12
